Squawktalk, listening to Megatron, flies to Cepta.

Squawktalk: Hello, hell=
o, you want the tour, right? Of course you do! Okay! Anyway, first of all, =
this is the main chamber, it serves well because it's main. It's where you =
are when you first walk in, it's where you are when you see the door! It's =
where we go sometime to leave the base, it's also where we go after we come=
 in! It's got all these cool computers and stuff, and tables and that and i=
t's where we are right now! Isn't that a coincidence? Well, anyway, it's a =
nice room maybe a little too dusty but then again maybe not and it's a good=
 room because it has lots of room, and it leads into all of the other rooms=
, it's also one of the biggest rooms, which is good, because everyone might=
 try to come in at the same time, and if they do and the room is really tin=
y then everyone will be crowded and the base might explode. Also, it's big =
because something might happen like someone breaks in, and there might be a=
 shootout and everyone will get shot if there isn't much room, did I mentio=
n that? I don't think I did, correct me if I'm wrong, but I know I'm not wr=
ong because I'm right. Anyway, I'm Squawktalk and you are? I mean what's yo=
ur name, I'm not calling you Squawktalk, that would be silly, wouldn't it? =
I hope you have a nice name, you probably do, but I still hope, because hop=
ing can get you stuff sometimes, and anyway, it's fun, so about your name, =
it should be nice because my name is cool and I met you, didn't I? Anyhow, =
what I was trying to say is that maybe we've spent too long in this room, w=
ant to go to the next room? It would be good because then we won't be in th=
is room and we'll be in the next one instead and I can talk to you in there=
 just hurry up and don't take forever, okay?...
